  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x122

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x76
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20

          text run at (0,0) width 148: "There should be a blue "

          LayoutText {#text} at (148,0) size 43x19
            text run at (148,0) width 43: "square"
        LayoutText {#text} at (190,0) size 47x19
          text run at (190,0) width 47: " below."
